actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance (without written report).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported adversely to Senate from the Committee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-1067.

official_title: A resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3946, a bill providing for a refundable Federal income tax credit for educational expenses.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3946 (Wool duty suspension).

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3946, a bill providing for a refundable Federal income tax credit for educational expenses.
